captions.text:
Peeking at you so no one 
would notice became my habit

Sometimes when our eyes meet 
I learned how to act normal

Action, I sometimes dream about 
Walking up to you and talking to you

Why do I freeze when you
Are in front of me?
I don't know why, girl

Oh My hairstyle is better than 
Other man
The new shirts I bought yesterday

Is like a perfect decalcomanie 
with the blue sky
Today I want to ask you out

Without my pride 
but it’s not easy

I just stare blankly at 
Some other place

Beautiful Girl
I like you, smiling in front of me

You are shining 
Beautifully

I really want to steal your heart 
I want you

Coz you are my 
Special girl
The chances I have to see you

Monday Tuesday Wednesday 
Thursday Friday

I want that bonus to 
see you on weekends

If I can see you 
coming to see me

I will give you everything, 
whatever it costs

To do that I need to have my own 
charm
To appeal to you

Because there are 
always guys around you
I gotta K.O him

Baby lean on me 
I won’t move if you are in my arms

I will give you everything 
I want to tell you

I will spend my time 
everyday only for you

But why is reality different 
from my heart

You don’t even know my name 
I pass by you quietly again

Beautiful Girl
I like you, smiling in front of me

You are shining 
Beautifully

I really want to steal your heart 
I want you

Coz you are my 
Special girl

You are beautiful spring summer 
fall and winter all seasons
After I saw you for the first time

your silhouette lingers even if 
I close my eyes

Yeah, So sweet, So sexy hey 
I can’t do anything because you
I’m All day All night long

Yeah, So sweet, So sexy ,hey 
I can’t do anything because you
I’m All day, All night long

Beautiful Girl
I like you, smiling in front of me

You are shining 
Beautifully

I really want to steal your heart 
I want you

Coz you are my
Special girl

comments.author: 101paramoreluver

comments.text:
+101paramoreluver 
Are you an Inspirit? If you are, you most likely know why already. If not, 
let me explain:
cuz a majority of the fangirls are Inspirits? We don't mind skinship. We 
actually don't see enough from our Infinite boys XP Inspirits are one of 
the calmest, most loving fandoms I know (I'm being biased as an Inspirit 
myself, but it's definitely true if you ask around). There are still 
ignorant, rude and crazy fangirls but you really won't see them around 
Infinite videos. If there are any crazies within our fandom we try to 
reason with them, and if that doesn't work, we just shun them. Works every 
time. XD
